item.title: Data from Ontogenetic thermal tolerance and performance of ectotherms at variable temperatures
item.description: Sources Background Summary of Re-analysis Reproducibility Post-publication review Reproducibility Table 1 Table 2 Table 3 Figure 2 Post-publication review Use the full model to compare to Huey & Kinsolver Table of contrasts needed for interpretation Harrell Plots of full model ignoring sex Summary of my Harrell Plots and Table of contrasts Shift in UTL Red Flags Statistical misconceptions Sources Cavieres G, Bogdanovich JM, Bozinovic F (2016) Ontogenetic thermal tolerance and performance of ectotherms at variable temperatures.
